channel.title: figma on Ma documentation
channel.description: Recent content in figma on Ma documentation

item.title: Raccourcis clavier
item.description: Zoom Shift + 0 : Zoom 100% Shift + 1 : Fit layer to screen Shift + 2 : Zoom in the selected frame Hide/Show Shift + R : Hide/Show Rulers Control + G : Hide/Show Layout Grids Tools P : Pen V : Move T : Text tool H : Hand I : Color picker Go to Option + 1 : Go to layers menu Option + 2 : Go to components menu For Windows, use Alt instead of Option
